content: of single_crochet around 24 44 single_crochet 2 decrease x 6 18 stuff the sausage now with polyfil fill it fully as you crochet the final row 45 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 46 decrease x 6 6 47 chain 8 turn skip 1 chain stitch slip_stitch 7 fasten_off yarn use darning needle to sew shut the end hole and weave in yarn end page | 8 © 2017 megan lapp all rights reserved this pattern is for selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by crafty intentions one nice green leaf use k or l hook use 4 strands each a different shade of green of worsted weight yarn at once 1 chain 25 turn 2 skip 1 st single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half trip x 2 treble_crochet x 8 half trip x 2 double_crochet x 2 half_double_crochet x 2 single_crochet x 3 slip_stitch 3 continue on opposite side of chain stitches exactly opposite of row 2 stitches single_crochet x 3 half_double_crochet x 2 double_crochet x 2 half trip x 2 treble_crochet x 8 half trip x 2 double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet 4 chain 2 on same side as row 2 front post all of the following stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half trip treble_crochet x 15 half trip double_crochet half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in last center chain st 5 on same side as row 3 chain 2 front post all of the following stitches half_double_crochet double_crochet half trip treble_crochet x 15 half trip double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet 6 chain 2 turn skip 1 stitch slip_stitch in chain st then slip_stitch down center of the leaf all the way back to the beginning chain 5 turn skip 1 st slip_stitch 4 back slip_stitch in base of leaf fasten_off yarn weave in all ends butterfly use g or h hook rainbow worsted weight variegated yarn make 1 1 chain 16 this chain 16 is from now on considered the original chain or oc turn skip 1 chain st single_crochet 3 2 chain 31 turn skip 3 chain st double_crochet half trip treble_crochet x 10 half trip x 5 double_crochet x 5 half_double_crochet x 4 single_crochet x 2 slip_stitch into next available oc 3 slip_stitch into next available oc turn blo single_crochet 25 along row 2 chain 5 turn skip 3 chain st double_crochet half trip treble_crochet x 8 half trip x 8 double_crochet x 4 half_double_crochet x 4 single_crochet slip_stitch into next
